name: Sunlight Policy
tagline: Another home for the Sunlight Foundation's policy research.
body:
See our original home for Sunlight Foundation Policy research at: http://sunlightfoundation.com/policy/ & http://sunlightfoundation.com/blog/policy/ ### Open Data * [US Open Data Map](https://github.com/sunlightpolicy/opendata/blob/master/USlocalpolicylocations.geoJSON) * [US Open Data Portals](https://github.com/sunlightpolicy/opendata/blob/master/USlocalopendataportals.csv) * [US examples of data inventories](https://github.com/sunlightpolicy/opendata/blob/master/USinventoryexamples.csv) * [INTERNATIONAL examples of data inventories](https://github.com/sunlightpolicy/opendata/blob/master/INTERNATIONALinventoryexamples.csv) See also, the [Sunlight Foundation Open Data Guidelines](http://sunlightfoundation.com/opendataguidelines/).

Are we missing any? Email us or Submit a Pull Request

### Campaign Finance ### Lobbying ### Procurement #### Contact File a pull request or email us at policy@sunlightfoundation.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
